lead_paragraph: The nephew of one of Mexico’s most-wanted drug suspects was detained, along with the acting police chief of a major port town.
snippet: The nephew of one of Mexico’s most-wanted drug suspects was detained, along with the acting police chief of a major port town.

headline.main: Mexico Makes 2 Arrests Linked to Drug Gangs
headline.print_headline: Mexico Makes 2 Arrests Linked to Drug Gangs
